name: bouncer
description: Verificando que solo los recursos cool ingresen al Kubernetes API

scripts.minikube-setup: minikube rm -p pepr-dev && minikube rm -p pepr-dev && kubectl rollout status deployment -n kube-system
scripts.k3d-setup: k3d cluster delete pepr-dev && k3d cluster create pepr-dev --k3s-arg '--debug@server:0' --wait && kubectl rollout status deployment -n kube-system
